nl.inl.blacklab.tools

Class SketchToXmlConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.tools.SketchToXmlConverter

  • public class SketchToXmlConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert the ANW Corpus Sketch format files to almost-identical XML files. Using XML is useful because it allows us to later easily display it using XSLT.
